text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Wow! A 『Naruto Whirlpool』!! Amazing, it really does spin like that after all!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: I can feel the intensity…! It's hard to believe that this is natural phenomenon! The power of the sea is to be feared…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Oh, there's another whirlpool there! Ah, another one here as well!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Round and round……! round, and… round…――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Chiyono O
text_block_list.text: Ah, ah…… My eyes, are spinning……
